summary: Index.css updates appear to implement new light theme tokens and a solid light-blue body background, and adjust heading/button glow behavior by scoping glow to dark mode. However, due to truncation of App.tsx and index.css, removal of the App-level gradient wrapper and full primary button hover/focus behavior cannot be conclusively verified. Several unrelated “feature summary/state” files were also modified in ways not requested by the theming change.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove/replace the hardcoded gradient background wrapper in frontend/src/App.tsx ("bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-100 via-pink-100 to-blue-100") so the top-level app container uses the global theme background consistently across routes.
missing_requirements.reason: The App.tsx diff is truncated and does not show the top-level wrapper/container className where the gradient classes would be removed, so this requirement cannot be verified from the provided diff evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure primary button hover/focus states keep the button yellow (#FFE066) with dark text, without neon glow/text-shadow that changes perceived color; implement via theme tokens in frontend/src/index.css.
missing_requirements.reason: The index.css diff is truncated in the section that begins to discuss button glow, so the exact hover/focus state styling for primary buttons cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated feature descriptions/claims (e.g., 46 games, new/optimized games, video generator functionality, jokes backend integration, virtual pet trophy accounting behavior) recorded in frontend-file-summaries.txt, which are not part of the requested global theming change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly restricts changes to focused global theming updates (index.css tokens and App.tsx wrapper) and forbids adding/modifying unrelated features; the diff shows modifications to a feature summary file containing extensive unrelated functionality claims.

hallucinated_features.description: Project-wide state/summary metadata describing broad app functionality in project_state.json, unrelated to the requested UI color/theme update.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-4/REQ-5/REQ-6; the theming request only calls for CSS variable/base style changes and App wrapper class updates, and constraints emphasize focused changes only.
